eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Washington; AT 04:17 PM ON NOV 18, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:17 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
AMBER Alert Issued - Grays Harbor County
The Washington State Patrol on behalf of the Odessa Police Department has issued an Amber Alert for a 12 year old and 8 year old Females. Victim #1 is 12 year old named Vanessa Gleaves. 5 Foot 4 Inches tall, weighs 90 pounds, has Blonde Hair, Brown & Hazel Eyes. Clothing Unknown. Victim #2 is 8 year old female name Audrey Gleaves. She is 4 Foot 6 inches tall. 65 pounds, with Brown Hair and Blue Eyes. Clothing Unknown. Both victims last seen on 11-18-2025 at 6:00 AM in the area of West Broadway Avenue and Montesano. They are in the company of Carolyn J. Gleave, a 40 year old Female, who is 5 Foot 8 Inches, weighing 120 pounds with Brown Hair. Brown Eyes. Carolyn is an escalated state of crisis. They may be heading to Deer Park in Spokane, Arizona, Utah, or California. They may be traveling in a 2014 Black Subaru Forrester. Washington License A Z B 4 6 0 0. If you have information, please call 9 1 1 or agency non-emergency 5 0 9 7 2 5 3 5 0 1.
